result.longName: Kuwait and Gulf Link Transport Company K.P.S.C.

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Kuwait and Gulf Link Transport Company K.P.S.C., together with its subsidiaries, provides integrated supply chain management services in the Middle East. It operates through Transportation services, Logistics services, Rental and Leasing services, and Others segments. The company offers supply chain management services, including warehousing and distribution, stevedoring, project cargo, and custom clearance, as well as air, land, and ocean freight services; and passenger and travel services, such as multi-model passenger transport services, and vehicle renting and leasing services for commercial and government clients. It also provides government services, which includes heavy lift, stevedoring and related terminal, distribution warehouse, logistics, transportation, car rental, ports operation, and food services. In addition, the company engages in the investment, development, and management of real estate and infrastructure projects; commercial trading, travel and tourism, insurance, garage and maintenance, and advertising activities; and the sale of spare parts and scraps, and vehicle maintenance. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Kuwait City, Kuwait.
